website_summaries.verdict: The traditional, simple serving tray found in schools and cafeterias all over the world. Good choice for people and families on a budget.
pros: Stands out for its variety of colors to mix and match, making it great for little kids and large families
cons: Not visually appealing for home kitchen and dining use

customer_reviews.title: Functional and Perfect for our Needs
customer_reviews.text: We wanted two unobtrusive brown trays that would sit under our toaster and coffeemaker on the brown granite countertop to contain crumbs and spills. These fit the bill perfectly. What's more to say? They arrived promptly and were put to work immediately. They are solid trays that are designed for serving but have been re-purposed in our household and do the job perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: CChris

customer_reviews.title: We use these trays as play stations for the kids ...
customer_reviews.text: We use these trays as play stations for the kids. One holds the school when set up, another the ice cream store and another the "outdoor" playground. They hold the items and allow me to move the kids' setups when I want to clean. '
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Tray
customer_reviews.text: I use this tray everyday of the week, dropped so many times I have lost count, washed in the dish washer weekly and it looks like the day I received it. For the money this was one of my best Amazon value purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Vinyl Kolector

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: This tray is large enough for me to carry my breakfast or lunch from our kitchen to my office desk without any problems. That is all I needed, and it is what I got. The bottom was flat, so my drinking glass and coffee cup stayed put, as did any dish or bowl.
customer_reviews.author: AlaProf

customer_reviews.title: AMGood Serving Trays Similar to Fast Food Type in Restaurants
customer_reviews.text: I looked a long time for some reasonably priced trays with this nice large size, and I was concerned that the price was so reasonable that they might be flimsy, but "no" they're perfect. I've dropped one and found no chipping or corner breaking like my old melamine ones. I highly recommend these trays.
customer_reviews.author: ConnieTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: This tray is amazing, it is rectangle and plastic
customer_reviews.text: This tray is amazing, it is rectangle and plastic! I sometimes like too imagine I'm at Arbys and will leave some arbys sauce to dry on the tray for the next member of my household to go eww! This tray brings back memory's of RAX and Sunday dinner at Roy Rogers with my grandparents after church. Buy it you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and big
customer_reviews.text: These trays are very sturdy and light. They stack very well and they are nice and big enough to put everything i need on it. I am going into surgery soon and These trays will make it much easier for my husband to bring my meals until I heal. I just ordered some more trays in a different color because i am so happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Burkhard

customer_reviews.title: Great for our family needs.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to have for crafting/coloring while I sit on the couch without a table nearby. Came as described, a little dusty, but in perfect condition. We'll be ordering more for the kids to use for legos/small toys. If I need a smooth surface, I'll flip it over and use the back. We might order even more for kitchen use too, at least in the summer when we send the kids outside to eat, as the budget allows.
customer_reviews.author: Riversong

customer_reviews.title: These things make great tool and parts trays
customer_reviews.text: These things make great tool and parts trays. I use them daily and love them. For some reason the red ones are holding up better to brake cleaner than the green ones, which are getting a convex shape in the middle. So red only for me now.
customer_reviews.author: mrofnoc

customer_reviews.title: Non Slip Tray
customer_reviews.text: This tray has a nonslip surface and is just like the ones used in many school lunch rooms, It is light and just the right size for me
customer_reviews.author: jimc

customer_reviews.title: Probably not worth what it cost
customer_reviews.text: It's a tray, it holds food pretty well. Only upgrade from my last tray is that it hasn't melted yet but only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: great for craft activity
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my daughter to make a fairy house. We used it as a platform and glued the house on top. Then she was able to decorate around the house. It was perfect size and color.
customer_reviews.author: K. Keyes

customer_reviews.title: More red than orange
customer_reviews.text: The quality seems okay, but the color seems much more red than orange. Not sure if I was sent the wrong one or if the photo is just not representative.
customer_reviews.author: DEM

customer_reviews.title: I've needed this for a long time!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised and just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: MMWest

customer_reviews.title: Good solid tray.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for, a durable plastic tray of the sort you find in cafeterias. I'm sure it will outlast me!
customer_reviews.author: BobR

customer_reviews.title: Great as cutting boards for meat!
customer_reviews.text: I love these things! I've been using cafeteria trays as kitchen prep cutting boards for years and these are identical to the ones that have been in my kitchen for thirty years.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this for my elderly mother whose vision is poor. One color she can see well is orange
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my elderly mother whose vision is poor. One color she can see well is orange, and she is able to use this to set up her meals. Not too heavy. Not too big. Perfect for her.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dale W. Angney

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. They hold a lot and they are light weight.
customer_reviews.author: J. J

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: very convenient to use, sturdy, easy to clean. perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: crafty

customer_reviews.title: Its not the tangerine orange in the picture... It's more red-orange.. .
customer_reviews.text: Its not the tangerine orange in the picture (Which is my favorite color)... It's more red-orange... Its still a great quality tray though.
customer_reviews.author: Schwifty

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: the tray is not flat, have a big high spot at the center
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NICE!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. They clean easilly. Just wish they were a bit larger!
customer_reviews.author: Teddy Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: Love using these in my classroom
customer_reviews.text: Love using these in my classroom, helping my students keep their materials in their space and not rolling all over!
customer_reviews.author: bgaydell

customer_reviews.title: dinner tray, perfect size, lightweight and strong enough
customer_reviews.text: This is lightweight and just strong enough for my use as a dinner tray.
customer_reviews.author: Mikel Gali

customer_reviews.title: but it's perfect for preparing food
customer_reviews.text: A little bit convex, so maybe not very suitable for carrying fragile stuff, but it's perfect for preparing food
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good value, as it came in exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Anny

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This tray was heavier than I expected! It is going to be very durable and I hope to have it for may years!!
customer_reviews.author: Debra L. Parrish

customer_reviews.title: they will hold a plate and drink and want bend
customer_reviews.text: i like the studiness that they have and the pretty color
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Serving trays review
customer_reviews.text: I use them for sorting parts for my projects. Then I can carry them for preparation.
customer_reviews.author: Mary L. Fryer

customer_reviews.title: It’s sturdy but light weight
customer_reviews.text: It indeed served my purpose. It’s sturdy but light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Malay_M

customer_reviews.title: Nice Brown Serving Trays for People or Pets
customer_reviews.text: These trays are virtually identical to the ones you see at McDonald's restaurants. The size is perfect for holding your meal on a tray table while affording your the luxury to know that if you spill something it will remain on the tray and not all over you and your floor. We also use these trays to serve our pet food. The tray holds the pet dishes in place and also makes it so much easier to clean up afterwards since the scraps/spills are contained on the tray. PROS: - nice size - fits a complete meal for one person - helps prevent spills - dishwasher safe - strong and durable CONS: - none found
customer_reviews.author: Electronicbuff

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size
customer_reviews.text: The product is okay, but their webpage is confusing. I visited the link of the size I wanted, then added it to my cart. Unfortunately, their page then defaulted to the smallest size tray they sell. I didn't notice that they changed it on my me, so when I finally got the product, it was the wrong size. The cost to return it is the same price as the item, so now I have to buy it again just to get the right product. Very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Z Witham

customer_reviews.title: Great price and good for many uses
customer_reviews.text: Great price and good for many uses. We purchased these to haul racks of meat to our smoker. Once we got them, we have used them under the dog bowl to collect spills, to carry food/dishes out to the deck, to hold small parts while repairing small appliances. I'm glad we got the multi pack rather than ordering just a couple.
customer_reviews.author: Born to Travel

customer_reviews.title: Had to return because they are not flat- they are warped upwards toward the center
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these trays- 10x14" one in brown and one in green. The size and colors were nice, the material nice. The only issue I had was that both trays were "warped up" in the center- did not lie totally flat. I have trays like this that I bought years ago, and they are FLAT. Hoping I can find a tray that is flat.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy little tray
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little tray for my Rolla tor seat, to carry a cup of hot coffee or bowl of soup to the dining table. Just the right size and will hold a 10" dinner plate. Probably overpriced for what it is, but meh... it's what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: HeatherTee

customer_reviews.title: This takes me back to school lunch!!! Yum!
customer_reviews.text: I though it was going to be the same size as a school lunch tray from the 90’s. I didn’t check the measurements and just ordered it. My mistake. It is about a quarter smaller but it looks sooo cute. It strong enough to carry a meal but I use it as a rolling tray. The size turned out to perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Mary L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice trays!
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought these to go under pet dishes. I only needed 2, but this was a good deal. They are perfect for holding plates etc on the patio. They are smaller than what you find in a restaurant, but that's what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: SHARI

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Was Looking For
customer_reviews.text: I got this tray and it was just what I was looking for. It is kind of slippery when you have plates, etc. on it, so maybe try a silicone or rubber mat to keep things from sliding around so much and to prevent spills.
customer_reviews.author: KRH

customer_reviews.title: helpful
customer_reviews.text: These trays have been and will continue to be used for many uses in my classroom! They are ideal!
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Very useful! Great price.
customer_reviews.text: So Handy! Who knew there would be so many uses for these trays. I bought them lunch trays to use at our lake house, but they have come in handy for all kinds of uses. I suppose I'll be ordering a second set for home.
customer_reviews.author: SOFLOFAM

customer_reviews.title: Practical Tray
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what you expect. I use it under cat food dishes to keep the floor clean. Like it enough that I just bought a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Willmott

customer_reviews.title: Bought it again!
customer_reviews.text: Great tray for a great price. This is my second one.

customer_reviews.title: Great tray
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with the tray. It is exactly what I wanted & is well made. I did not find it flimsy at all. Good price too!

customer_reviews.title: Like a school cafeteria in a nice color.
customer_reviews.text: Love these trays. Very school cafeteria looking and nice quality. Kids love them.

customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. I use it in my workshop to protect my workbench top when sharpening tools.

customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect tray to hold a meal and medications for my grandmother. I like the lip on it, because it helps keep things on there better than a completely flat surface.

customer_reviews.text: It's true!!!! The tray warps in the middle, just enough to make your plate slide. Don't dare sit a drink near the middle!

customer_reviews.title: These are the perfect size, lightweight and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect size, lightweight and sturdy. They are better than woven wooden trays and clean up very easy. Come in assorted colors.
